text: Piletosoma argoponalis is a moth in the family Crambidae. It is found in Panama. The wingspan is about 27 mm. The forewings are brown-black with a bronzy reflection.Proc. U.S. nat. Mus. 47 (2050) : 274 ==References== Category:Moths described in 1914 Category:Pyraustinae
title: Piletosoma argoponalis
